uploader.description: A function used to upload assets, this function needs to return a 'Promise'(https://github.com/lkangd/upload-webpack-plugin#uploader).

sync.description: Synchronous upload, the packaging logic will continue to be executed when all resources are uploaded successfully or failed(https://github.com/lkangd/upload-webpack-plugin#sync).

gather.description: Get all the assets that need to be uploaded at one time. If this option is specified, the 'uploader' function needs to return a result 'map' synchronously.(https://github.com/lkangd/upload-webpack-plugin#gather).

exclude.description: Types of assets that do not need to upload(https://github.com/lkangd/upload-webpack-plugin#exclude).

include.description: Types of assets that only need to upload, if this option is specified, the 'exclude' option will be ignored(https://github.com/lkangd/upload-webpack-plugin#include).

clean.description: If this option is specified, if the assets has been uploaded successfully, the assets will not emit to local directory(https://github.com/lkangd/upload-webpack-plugin#clean).

toReplaceFileTypes.description: Types of assets that need to replace reference link of the uploaded assets. default: ['.css', '.js', '.html'].(https://github.com/lkangd/upload-webpack-plugin#toReplaceFileTypes)
